title: Which block takes the longest to land

content.description:
Refer to the following material to give answers to the group of questions.

Three identical blocks each take a different path from a height h to the ground. Block A is released from rest and falls vertically. Block B is released from rest and slides down a frictionless incline. Block C is projected horizontally with an initial speed v.
content.question: Which block takes the longest time to reach the ground?

choices.label: The blocks take the same time to reach the ground.

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
